Dataset (Source/Database Name): GlobalData analysis based on information from Central Agency for Public Mobilization and Statistics - Egypt, United States Census Bureau and International Monetary Fund
Definition: Mid-year population is defined as total population of all age groups who are residents in a given country at the middle of each year.
Methodology Notes: Data obtained from above mentioned sources is used to derive a base dataset for total mid year population. Estimates are derived using various time series techniques like auto regressive modeling and multiple-regression depending on the historic time trend in the data. Forecasts are derived by using trends in related variables from reliable sources.
